General.Name: Rice Acquisition Corp II
General.Description: Rice Acquisition Corp. II does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. Rice Acquisition Corp. II was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Carnegie, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 102 East Main Street, Carnegie, PA, United States, 15106
